name: Death Trials
storyline: You wake up in total darkness. It feels like you're in a rusty metal cage, which hangs in mid air. There's a small light against the wall twenty feet away, but you can't get out. Just as your eyes adjust, the cage door slowly opens... You jump from the cage... three feet below to the floor... and into the darkness...
